Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute near Sheridan/Albion
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses rerouted WB via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Clark & Devon; EB via Devon, Clark, Pratt, Ashland & Morse due to street blockage near Sheridan/Albion.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Sheridan/Albion.

  • Westbound buses will operate via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Clark & Devon.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via Devon, Clark, Pratt, Ashland & Morse.

Allow extra travel time.
